title: Model insertion/deletion not properly logged/played back

content.raw:
I'm not sure if the problem is during logging or playback.

# Insertion

While recording a log, insert some models. During playback, you'll get messages like:

~~~
...
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_1]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_10]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_11]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_12]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_13]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_2]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_3]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_4]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_5]
...
~~~

# Deletion

While logging, delete a model which has been in the scene since before starting to log. During playback the model doesn't disappear.
content.html:
I'm not sure if the problem is during logging or playback.

Insertion

While recording a log, insert some models. During playback, you'll get messages like:

...
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_1]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_10]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_11]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_12]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_13]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_2]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_3]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_4]
[Err] [World.cc:1743] Unable to find model[unit_box_5]
...

Deletion

While logging, delete a model which has been in the scene since before starting to log. During playback the model doesn't disappear.
